entry.key: @<file_name> @<file_name> @<file_name> @<file_name> can you make it so that players can pick their own colour, and that in the Death log and within the scoreboard and team selection UI their colour will be displayed?

@<file_name> @<file_name> @<file_name> this should play a random sound down my microphone in game but it doesnt, the last log Plugin.Log.LogInfo($"[MixedAudioProvider] Playing clip: {Path.GetFileName(randomFile)}"); does get output with no errors
AudioInEnumerator.MicWrapper(deviceName, (int)r.SamplingRate); does not exist, please fix it.
AudioInEnumerator.MicWrapper(deviceName, (int)r.SamplingRate); doesnt exist
Can you make a method that can be called to reinitialise everything? add an RPC so it can be called for other clients if i ever need it to be

Can you make two methods in HideAndSeekManager. One that can destroy all of the hide and seek game (configuration can stay loaded) and one that can reinitialise the entire hide and seek game. Then make a third helper method which calls both
Deathlog is supposed to copy the font of AscentUI, but it seems to be changing to a basic font

I hate this part of deathlog, playerStatsTransform.anchoredPosition = new Vector2(-200f, -20f);
can you make it so that it is automatically aligned to the top right?
Now make it so when all hiders have been caught the scoreboard shows for everyone for 30 seconds or until they press tab, then the game restarts to team selection UI
This change results in all of the names being white, the custom colour does not load
This doesn't automatically play on the other clients, can you use photon PUN RPC to make it so the same sound plays on their client please

When players are ready, the team selection UI closes and opens again, can you fix it to just close once ready
@<file_name> @<file_name> @<file_name> @<file_name> @<file_name> @<file_name> @<file_name>
When the game is over can you make it so the scoreboard says "Game Over!" and displays "New game in..." and then a timer ticking down?

[Error :hide_and_peak] [MixedVoicePatch] Failed to get microphone reader from original factory! [Error : Unity Log] NullReferenceException: Object reference not set to an instance of an object Stack trace: Photon.Voice.Unity.Recorder.CreateLocalVoiceAudioAndSource () (at <3ff2b511de1a41cb88eb39b00d5f03f2>:0) Photon.Voice.Unity.Recorder.StartRecording () (at <3ff2b511de1a41cb88eb39b00d5f03f2>:0) Photon.Voice.Unity.Recorder.Update () (at <3ff2b511de1a41cb88eb39b00d5f03f2>:0)
can you find out why the deathlog doesnt display for the host? it displays on the others screens. this is despite adddeath running on the host and the log in update working on the host as well.
can you stop the camera moving when i move the cursor on team selection UI
r.CreateDefaultSource(); doesnt exist
r.IsRecording doesnt exist
still doesnt work and now microphone doesnt work either
yes please add a small margin, can you also make it so pressing F5 will run a test death so I can see it in game?
you broke it IBufferReader is not real
you've introduced bugs
